messages.title: Your yearly bonus has arrived
messages.description: Thank you for chosing us, we have added a yearly bonus to you balance!

messages.title: Meeting, today at 2PM
messages.description: Will you be joining us at the salesmeeting at 2PM this afternoon?

messages.title: There are bagels in the cafeteria
messages.description: My wife made some bagels, I don't like them, so I left them in the cafeteria. PLEASE be sure to take one.
